Sentence: When she (Linda) discovers that Benny and Ellen are to receive similar treatment, Linda hatches a desperate plan
Benny remains with Aunt Martha, and Linda is reunited with Ellen, who is now nine years old and living in Brooklyn, New York
Hobbs will take Ellen back to the South, putting her (Ellen) beyond Linda's reach forever
Flint now claims that the sale of Benny and Ellen was illegitimate, and Linda is terrified that he (Flint) will re-enslave all of them
When Linda returns to Boston, Ellen goes to boarding school and Benny moves to California with Linda's brother William
